title: Sweet and spicy nuts and cherries

default: 50g/2oz canned black cherries, stones removed, drained
1 orange, cut into wedges, to serve

steps: Place the sugar into a frying pan and heat until melted and golden. Add the chilli flakes and the nuts and cook over a low heat, stirring occasionally, for 2-3 minutes.
Add the lime and orange juice, the chopped mint and cherries and stir well to coat in the caramel.
To serve, pour the sweet and spicy nuts and cherries into a bowl and garnish with the orange wedges.
